member.name: T:VXI11.vxi11
member.summary: A collection of constants used by the "vxi11" ONC/RPC program.

members.member: The class vxi11_DEVICE_ASYNC_Client implements the client stub proxy for the DEVICE_ASYNC remote program. It provides method stubs which, when called, in turn call the appropriate remote method (procedure).

The class vxi11_DEVICE_CORE_Client implements the client stub proxy for the DEVICE_CORE remote program. It provides method stubs which, when called, in turn call the appropriate remote method (procedure).

The class vxi11_DEVICE_INTR_Client implements the client stub proxy for the DEVICE_INTR remote program. It provides method stubs which, when called, in turn call the appropriate remote method (procedure).
